page_content: The page discusses an upcoming football match and advises attendees to use public transport due to limited parking and potential traffic delays.
The page discusses the taxability of foreign pensions and retirement benefits in Switzerland.
The page provides information on personnel expenses, including wages, social security contributions, and other related costs.
The page outlines allowable professional expenses for tax purposes in Switzerland, including limitations on deductions for travel costs.
The page provides information, guidelines, and forms related to waterway maintenance and financing in the canton.
The page briefly lists categories of other assets like vehicles and photovoltaic systems for tax purposes.
The page discusses the expansion of the TaxMe online portal for tax-related services in the Canton of Bern.
